articles.author: CHRISTOPHER RUGABER
articles.title: Sluggish US jobs report clears the way for Federal Reserve to cut interest rates - The Associated Press
articles.description: Hiring by America’s employers picked up a bit in August from July’s tepid pace, and the unemployment rate dipped for the first time since March in a sign that the job market may be cooling but remains sturdy. Employers added a modest 142,000 jobs, up from a s…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Hiring by Americas employers picked up a bit in August from Julys tepid pace, and the unemployment rate dipped for the first time since March in a sign that the job market may be cool… [+6615 chars]

articles.author: Mick Krever, Ibrahim Dahman, Kareem Khadder, Abeer Salman, Jennifer Hansler
articles.title: American activist shot dead during protest in West Bank, Palestinian officials say - CNN
articles.description: A 26-year-old American activist, Aysenur Eygi, has been shot and killed during an anti-settlement protest near Nablus, in the Israeli-occupied West Bank, according to US and Palestinian officials.
articles.content:
A 26-year-old American activist, Aysenur Eygi, has been shot and killed during an anti-settlement protest near Nablus, in the Israeli-occupied West Bank, according to US and Palestinian officials.

articles.title: The Putin Propaganda Chief Who the U.S. Says Is Now After American Minds - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Justice Department names Sergei Kiriyenko as curator of some 30 internet domains aimed at misleading U.S. voters
articles.content:
Since arriving at the Kremlin, Sergei Kiriyenkos job has been to make sure the Russian people see only what President
